Sencha Try

Displaying an icon on a Button component using Ext JS

The following example shows how you can display an icon on an Ext.Button control by setting the icon property to a file path or a data URI.

Tags: Ext JS Ext JS 4.0.7 Ext.button.Button Ext.Button button icon
[example]
© 2012 Sencha Inc. 
/*global Ext:false */
Ext.application({
    name: 'Ext.Array.clean()',
    launch: function () {
        Ext.create('Ext.Button', {
            text: 'I\'m a button!',
            icon: 'data:application/ico;base64,AAABAAEAEBAAAAEAIABoBAAAFgAAACgAAAAQAAAAIAAAAAEAIAAAAAAAQAQAABMLAAATCwAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAACAAAABAAAAAgAAAANAAAAEQAAABUAAAAYAAAAGRg4ADcfUQCpFj4AUwAAABoAAAAaAAAAFwAAABAAAAAKAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAIlwCUB9WAP8dTwBgAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAACVoEkAjYQj/H1YA/x1RAEAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAACt/QBAodi3PJmsZ/yNhCP8gWAG/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAALphnEC2RXYAtiU7vK4BA/yl2Lf8mbBr/I2IJ/wAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAQpz4gEJYinxaYI/8UnCP/FaI1/xanPP8boTz/II4u/yVwG/8AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAQtWBgErBN7xKiOf8Upz//FqxH/xewT/8XtFP/GLdQ/xe4Rv8XsTT/AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARwXowE8Bu/xW7Yv8Vr1j/F7Rg/xi3Zf8Zu2j/Gb5p/xm/Y/8Zvln/GLxLnwAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAFMmBrxjMgv8Ywnj/F7hv/xi8dv8ZwHn/GcJ7/xnEef8ZxHT/GcJo7xnAXSAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAACHSm/8j1aL/HMmO/xi8ff8ZwYP/GcSG/xnGhv8Zx4T/GcZ+7xnFdTAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA91sX/PdXD/zXEqf8guof/GcOK/xrGjf8ayIzvGsiJgBnIhRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPdfH/z3Wxf86zrn/Lq+L/xzBje8axo+AGsiPEAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAD3Xx88918f/PdbF/zK2ms8vrosQAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA918dQPdfH/z3Xx/891sUwAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAD3Xx58918f/PdfHMAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPdfHUD3Xx68918cQAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAD19f+P9vX/h/YA/wf19fwHAADwBwAA4AcAAMAHAP/AB///wA///8Af///Af///wf8AAMP/AADj/wAA8f8AAA==',
            renderTo: Ext.getBody()
        });
    } // launch
}); // Ext.application()
